text: The Border is a 1982 American crime drama movie by director Tony Richardson. It stars Jack Nicholson, Warren Oates and Harvey Keitel. The movie is set in Texas and is about a group of US Border Patrol agents who look after the border between the US and Mexico. ==Other websites== * Category:1982 crime drama movies Category:1980s American crime drama movies Category:1980s English-language movies Category:Movies set in Texas Category:Movies directed by Tony Richardson Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: The Border
